review_text: I finally pulled this out and used it after owning it for more than a year.  Everything went smooth and my sorbet is fine but....this machine is so loud that it is annoying.  To have to listen to this for 20-30 minutes is extremely difficult.  Having never used another ice cream maker, I don't know how it compares.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
